title: Roasted Cauliflower
introduction: Cauliflower goes from bland to delicious when it is roasted until lightly browned. For variation, toss the cooked cauliflower with a little balsamic vinegar.
ingredients: Salt and freshly ground black pepper
instructions: 1. Cut the cauliflower into 2-inch florets. Trim off the ends of the stems. Cut thick stems crosswise into 1/4-inch slices.

2. Place a rack in the center of the oven. Preheat the oven to 350Â°F. Spread the cauliflower in a roasting pan just large enough to hold it in single layer. Toss with the oil and a generous sprinkle of salt and pepper.
3. Bake, stirring occasionally, for 45 minutes or until the cauliflower is tender and lightly browned. Serve warm.
variations: Toss the cooked cauliflower with a little balsamic vinegar for added flavor.
